data.comment: Today's referee, Kevin Stott, has blown to start the match.
Minnesota's Mason Toye breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 2, Kevin Stott awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Kansas City's Khiry Shelton gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Gadi Kinda (Kansas City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Johnny Russell for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Gadi Kinda (Kansas City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 8, Kansas City pushes forward through Luis Martins, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 10, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
The match at Children's Mercy Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jacori Hayes, who is down injured.
In the minute 14, Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
Minnesota's Jacori Hayes is back in action after a slight knock.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 15, Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 19, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Minnesota advance rapidly upfield but Kevin Stott blows for offside.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 21, In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Minnesota's area.
Kansas City are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 23, Kansas City's Gianluca Busio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
In Kansas City Kansas City attack through Khiry Shelton. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In Kansas City Kansas City drive forward through Gianluca Busio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 27, Kansas City to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
In the minute 29, Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Graham Zusi (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 32, Kevin Stott signals a Kansas City throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Kansas City's Roberto Puncec gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 34, Gadi Kinda of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In the minute 37, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Khiry Shelton for Kansas City drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Minnesota.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Graham Zusi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
In the minute 44, Kevin Stott signals a Kansas City throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Kansas City are pushing forward but Gadi Kinda's finish is wide of the goal.
Kevin Stott awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Kansas City's Luis Martins misses with an attempt on goal.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
The away team replace Raheem Edwards with Kevin Molino.
In the minute 46, Adrian Heath (Minnesota) is making a first substitution, with Chase Gasper replacing Jose Aja.
The away team have replaced James Musa with Robin Lod. This is the third substitution made today by Adrian Heath.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Kevin Stott awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a Kansas City throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City are caught offside.
In the minute 52, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
Cameron Duke is on a sub for Khiry Shelton for Kansas City.
In the minute 55, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
Kansas City's Gerso Fernandes breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Minnesota are coming forward and Mason Toye gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Gadi Kinda for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In Kansas City Kansas City attack through Gerso Fernandes. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 62, Free kick Kansas City.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
At Children's Mercy Park, Minnesota are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kansas City drive upfield and Johnny Russell gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
Important block from the Minnesota defence as Felipe Hernandez fires in a strike for Kansas City.
In the minute 67, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Kevin Stott awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Adrian Heath is making the team's fourth substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Emanuel Reynoso replacing Mason Toye.
In the minute 68, Minnesota have a goal kick.
Throw-in Minnesota.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 72, Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Minnesota.
Minnesota are pushing forward but Kevin Molino's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 75, Kevin Stott awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
Minnesota make their fifth substitution with Thomas Chacon replacing Jacori Hayes.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
Minnesota's Chase Gasper gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Johnny Russell puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Graham Zusi.
In the minute 83, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Kansas City.
Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Minnesota's Chase Gasper breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Minnesota.
Johnny Russell for Kansas City has been booked by Kevin Stott and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Minnesota push forward at Children's Mercy Park and Jan Gregus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kansas City defence.
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Minnesota's Hassani Dotson has been booked in Kansas City.
